QuestData.Title: Through the Looking Glass
QuestData.Description:
An ally of yours, Thaelin, is helping us counter the Iron Horde.
He claims this device can be used to spy on the enemy, even so far as hearing what they are saying at great distance.
I do not trust such devices. Use it and let me know what you see.
QuestData.CompletionText: Take a look through Thaelin's Observicopter. I don't trust that machine.
QuestData.RewardText: Orgrim leads the Iron Horde in Talador... Now we know the face of our enemy.
